title: Tomato chutney
ingredients: ['1.4kg tomatoes', '3.75L boiling water', '250ml cider vinegar', '125ml apple juice', '300g dark brown soft sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 lemon, quartered and sliced thin']
